title: Requires requiring health insurance policies to provide coverage for medically necessary care for the treatment of autism spectrum disorder
summary: Requires health insurance policies to provide coverage for screening, tests, assessments and treatment including any medically necessary care for the treatment of autism spectrum disorder, including Asperger's disorder and pervasive developmental disorders.
